column7: passed away at 10:08 p. m. on saturday
column10: at the mercy hospital in springfield. he was born august 26
column14: the son of the late fred eugene and flossie (coker) hutchison. bobby was a 1957graduate of verona high school and was retired after 23 years from the united states air force. after retiring from the air force he worked for the aurora police department and the lawrence county sheriff's department. on december 23
column16: he married wanda sue howard in aurora. he will be sadly missed and lovingly remembered by his wife of 55 years
column32: michaela and baley hutchison; six great-grandchildren; two brothers
column36: arizona and tedd hutchison of monett; one brother-in-law
column38: rhea lynn howard of monett and several nieces and nephews. his sister
column41: ernest ray branstetter also preceded him in death. a visitation will be held from 6:00-8:00 p. m. on wednesday
column44: at the crafton-cantrell funeral home in aurora. memorial donations may be made to the american heart association in care of the funeral home. online condolences may be shared at this website. funeral information. visitation6:00-8:00 p. m.
